name: Young Professional One
shortDescription: Exclusively for under 30's with a 4-year qualification, this bundle includes ONE account that pays you interest and ONE facility with up to 40-days interest free credit, plus all the private banking perks at a 50% reduced monthly fee.
description: If you’re under 30 with a four-year degree, we know you are going places. Get fast-tracked into a private banking experience at a 50% reduced monthly fee.This bundle includes ONE account that pays you interest and ONE credit facility at a personalised interest rate with up to 40-days interest free, plus all the perks you deserve.
specialFeature: UNDER 30 WITH A MIN 4 YEAR DEGREE
additionalInfo: Professional ONE account with significant transactional value and earn 0,75% interest on your positive balances
A credit facility (minimum R2,000) with up to 40-days interest free
Professional credit cards with local and international travel and lifestyle benefits
Dedicated relationship banker for you and your household, supported by a dedicated credit team and with access to investment, global-banking and wealth specialists
Nedbank Money app or Online Banking for world-class secure digital banking
SMS notifications: eNotes and No-funds alert
salesHighlights: sh1~A banking package that works as hard as you do
sh2~Lifestyle perks for the entire family
sh3~Unique investments to suit your lifestyle
sh4~Finance that lets you dream big
sh5~Ways to bank that suit your hours
sh6~Tailored offering for young professionals and those over 54
valueAddedServices: Greenbacks (Get rewarded for your everyday spend)
Contactless-enabled cards (tap your card and pay)

eligibilityRules.description: Minimum 4 year degree or 3 years plus Honours (NQF level 8 equivalent)
There is no minimum income requirement.

eligibilityRules.valueUnit: Not available to trust, companies or legal entities

eligibilityRules.description: There is no minimum income requirement, however this bundle is subject to the approval of a minimum R2,000 credit facility. All credit facilities are subject to credit and affordability checks

requiredDocuments.description: card/document or passport with valid permit

requiredDocuments.attributeName: 3-Months bank statements or letter of appointment/contract
requiredDocuments.description: (we can source these for you from most banks)
for overdraft and credit card applications, additional documents may be required
You will be required to sign a declaration that you have the required level of education to qualify

productFeatures.name: Cashwithdrawalsatparticipatingretailers
productFeatures.description: Cash withdrawals at participating retailers and at a Nedbank ATM included

productFeatures.name: AirtimewithoutAirtime
productFeatures.description: Airtime without Airtime (purchase airtime without having airtime using *130*001#)

productFeatures.name: SendiMali
productFeatures.description: Send i-Mali (Send money to a cellphone number using *120*001#)

productFeatures.name: Chargecard
productFeatures.description: American Express® Platinum Charge Card available at 50% discounted annual fee (for the first year only)

productFeatures.name: Internationalairportloungeaccess
productFeatures.description: Ten visits per annum. One guest per visit

productFeatures.name: Domesticairportloungeaccess
productFeatures.description: Unlimited access to Bidvest domestic and international lounges

productFeatures.name: Forexdelivery
productFeatures.description: Free forex delivery (foreign cash & travel card) at preferential rates

productFeatures.name: Insurance
productFeatures.description: Travel insurance included when paying with your Professional Banking Credit Card.

productFeatures.name: Tailoredfinancing
productFeatures.description: Tailored financing: 100% loans for home loan applications of less than R1,5 million and 100% loans **for vehicle finance applications of less than R400 000.,All credit applications are subject to final credit approval and terms and conditions.
